SummaryEnglish: Adapted from the classic fairy tale, the descendants of Niu Lang and Zhi Nv continue to write a new chapter of adventure. The twenty-eight constellations contain the power of stars, which can destroy the world. Unfortunately, Zhi Nv, who is in charge of the constellations, is greedy for the mortal world, causing the stars to escape, causing disaster. Many years later, Zhi Nv's son Jinfeng came to the mortal world for his mother, and teamed up with the mortal girl Xiaofan to conquer the stars. Accompanied by humans and gods, they encountered many dangers along the way, and the mystery of Xiaofan's life experience and the truth of Zhi Nv's crime gradually surfaced.
